alert.note: Alert for Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 21 at 3:02AM MST until December 24 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches from north entrance to Old Faithful and 12 to 16 inches possible in elevations above 9,000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Yellowstone National Park and Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM Wednesday night through 6 AM Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult over Togwotee and Teton Passes. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As snow looks to continue into Friday afternoon, winter storm highlights may need to be extended to highlight continuing impacts.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Yellowstone National Park
